Authoring Support for Language Variants (cont’d)

  • Recommended solution: do not add authoring support for language variants to the spec.

    • But remain open to proposals developed by the working group for how to accomplish this capability.

  • Pro: keeps spec. simple (KISS)

    • avoids complexity of interactions between variants and versions
    • avoids complexity of discovering server’s namespace conventions for relating language variants
    • avoids providing capability for client to map variants to the resource on which negotiation takes place
